answers:
In CrPC chapter:2 and section:22 
 Title: Local Jurisdiction of Executive Magistrates 
 Description: Subject to the control of the State Government, the District Magistrate may, from time to time, define the local limits of the areas within which the Executive Magistrates may exercise all or any of the powers with which they may be invested under this Code.
		Except as otherwise provided by such definition, the jurisdiction and powers of every such Magistrate shall extend throughout the district.
